description: Number of segments (and sides) created by diagonals of n-gon.
comments: There is a connection to A014626: number of intersection points of diagonals of n-gon, plus number of vertices, b(n) = n*(n+1)*(n^2-7*n+18)/24 and A006522: number of regions created by sides and diagonals of n-gon, c(n) = (n-1)*(n-2)*(n^2-3*n+12)/24. These are related by the Euler-formula: b(n) + c(n) - a(n) = 1. - _Georg Wengler_, Mar 31 2005
